Package com.dhk.controller.button

Class AbstractButtonController

java.lang.Object
com.dhk.controller.button.AbstractButtonController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApplyDisplayModeButtonController, ClearAllButtonController, ClearHotKeyButtonController, ExitButtonController, MinimizeButtonController, MinimizeToTrayButtonController, PaypalDonateButtonController, RefreshAppButtonController, RunOnStartupButtonController, ThemeButtonController
public abstract class AbstractButtonController extends Object
Provides a method to initialize the state change listeners for a button.

    • initStateChangeListeners

      public void initStateChangeListeners(AbstractButton button, Component defaultFocusComponent)
      Initializes the state change listeners for the given button.
      Parameters:
      button - - The button to initialize the state change listeners for
      defaultFocusComponent - - The component to give focus to when the cursor leaves the button
